tier_1_determinative.theft_or_attempted_theft: Actual theft of cash amounting to Rs.14 lakhs.
tier_1_determinative.voluntary_causing_or_attempting_death_hu: Assault on the complainant and one other person during the robbery.

tier_3_contextual.incident_location: Western Express Highway, Andheri Bridge, Andheri (East), Mumbai.

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Akshay Eknath Kokate vs. State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_appellant: Mr. Shaikh Abdul Kalam a/w Ms. Sana Shaikh
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_respondent: Ms. P. P. Shinde, A.P.P for the Respondent â€“ State
tier_4_procedural.sections_invoked: Sections 392 r/w 34 of the Indian Penal Code
tier_4_procedural.acts_and_sections: Indian Penal Code, Section 392 read with Section 34

residual_details.additional_facts: The applicant was identified in a Test Identification Parade by the complainant. The applicant allegedly purchased a motorcycle with the stolen amount. The applicant has been in custody since November 2017, and no witnesses have been examined in the trial yet.
